title: Improve stability when using Skype For Business
body: Fix whatever issues are related to using Edge when also using Skype For Business.  I get random screen freezing (monitor freezes, and I have to change display settings-if it's not my primary screen or reboot to get it working again). As well, the new Skype For Business screen sharing has caching issues if you aren't in a conference (just doing peer to peer with VBSS) if I have been using Edge.
